hero.title: High-Altitude Gastronomy
hero.subtitle: in Its Purest Form
hero.description: Experience unique gastronomy where signature cuisine merges with the most impressive mountain landscapes.

features.altitude: Exclusive experiences at over 2,500 meters altitude
features.monthly: Monthly events in unique Andes locations

gastronomy.title: Mountain Flavors
gastronomy.subtitle: Ancestral Ingredients and Techniques
gastronomy.description: Our gastronomic proposal rescues native ingredients and traditional techniques from highland communities, presented with a contemporary twist.

highlightDish.name: Highland Lamb
highlightDish.description: Lamb raised at over 3,000 meters, slow-cooked with wild aromatic herbs and highland vegetables.

experience.title: Extraordinary Experiences
experience.subtitle: More than dinner, a gastronomic adventure
experience.description: Discover what our guests say about their unique experiences in our high-altitude gastronomic destinations.

location.title: Exclusive Locations
location.description: Spaces carefully selected for their natural beauty and accessibility

events.title: Unique Events
events.description: Each experience is unrepeatable, designed according to season and location

service.title: Personalized Service
service.description: Dedicated attention with a maximum of 12 guests per event
